Additional Resources

Consult these resources if you’re interested in learning more about theories of youth development.

  • The Growth of Knowledge is a 10 minute video by CrashCourse that provides an overview of Piaget’s stages of cognitive development.
  • Over at cuppacocoa, blogger and former teacher JoEllen describes real-world examples of scaffolding in her post The Zone of Proximal Development.
  • Lev Vygotsky’s Theory of Cognitive Development is an 11-minute video by Altaf Solangi
  • Vygotsky and Scaffolding is a 4-minute video by Peter Lyon
  • In this 20-minute TedX Talk titled Seymour Papert: Inventor of Everything, Gary Stager introduces Seymour Papert’s “wit, wisdom, and powerful ideas.”
